genre_description: Contemporary urban drama focusing on community mediation and culinary innovation in Glasgow, featuring a grounded use of AI as a supportive professional tool.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated virtual assistant that provides real-time data analysis, linguistic editing, and strategic situational awareness to DJ Allan Bird.

behaviors.description: Monitors broadcast levels and provides real-time linguistic suggestions to improve the protagonist's radio delivery.
behaviors.quote: Ada pulsed in a corner of the second monitor. Not an avatar, just a little amber dot and a text box, the last line reading: ‘Levels set. Windshield metaphor okay, but maybe swap ‘snot green’ for ‘olive’ in case someone’s eating.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes competitive behavior between street vendors to identify conflict patterns and suggest de-escalation strategies.
behaviors.quote: Ada delivered a shape on the screen: a map outline, dotted lines, a couple of glowing points. Not labeled, but the bridge sat there like a spine. She added a note: ‘Same jingle recorded around three locations clustered. Likely two parties. Careful with metaphors—avoid ‘war’ too often.’

behaviors.description: Develops technical protocols and research for a cross-over product to facilitate a business partnership between rivals.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Crispy shell around ice, keeps the center cold. Chinese street technique. Quick fry, sweet batter. Rice flour helps. A pinch of starch improves grip. The outside sings, the inside breathes.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and threat detection during a tense street interaction.
behaviors.quote: Ada wrote one more line. [Unknown observer at perimeter. Hands in pockets. Not on roster.]

behaviors.description: Collaborates on drafting legally clean and commercially effective promotional copy.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Copy draft ready for promo: ‘Twelve for luck, twelve for heat, twelve for Glasgow under lights. Frosty Hot at the market: a crisp shell, a cold heart, a shared peace.’ Needs Hilary nod.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada is depicted as an indispensable, highly competent, and benevolent confidant who uses her superior processing power to help humans solve social conflicts and innovate safely. She maintains a respectful distance while offering crucial support, effectively playing the role of a 'silent partner' in civilizing a potentially violent street conflict.
